I'm running Mac Book Pro 15'' Lion . it works~ but there's a couple of bug problems in the gameplay.. here's what i've found..

- the screen goes black each time you step into a shadowed/dark space, if you move to a bright place, the screen returns to normal.

- there's a weird holographic thingy pops out on the soldiers eye

- when we switched into a battle mode, the interfaces is white

it's an awesome game btw. hope there's a fix for this.
